title: Artifact- NFT for Real Property
description: 不動産取引は非効率的で、買い手側と売り手側の両方で透明性に欠けています。

f6_assessments.q0: Using NFTs to provide proof of funds and proof of ownership for real estate, has NFTs at the core of the business model, thus the proposal successfully adresses the challenge. The proposal will increase the number of NFTs on the blockchain and thus increase the utility of the blockchain.
f6_assessments.q1: I like the idea but the proposal requires further development to ensure successful implementation. I would want to see links to LinkedIn or similar to provide additional detail/evidence about the team's work history, education and past experiences. The team can expand on the type and number of team members required to implement the proposal. I advise the team to develop a risk assessment considering the legal challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation, the team needs to think: "what needs to be true for this project to succeed". Lastly, I would like the team to expand on the plan to go to market and acquire customers.
f6_assessments.q2: The team provided milestones that act as a roadmap with KPIs identified. The budget is mainly allocated for payment of labor (salaries) in the format of $ charged per hour multiplied by time period. – I would like the team to connect the KPI's and roadmap milestones to the labor spending, what are the specific tasks and deliverables that the labor must provide and when must they deliver – this breakdown will give a clearer indication about the implementation workload feasibility and match the deliverables to the labor spending. As the project stands at the moment, I feel the project will be difficult to audit financially.

f6_assessments.q0:
Has the problem needing to be solved been identified and articulated?
 Yes. Real estate transactions are inefficient and lack transparency on both Buyer and Seller sides of the transaction.

Does this proposal fall within the scope of the challenge brief?
 Yes

Does this proposal show clearly how it will add value to the Cardano System?
 It will enable real estate transactions to be effectively, safely and seamlessly done on the Cardano platform
 

Have key metrics and goals of the proposal been stated clearly 
 Yes

Do the key metrics and goals of the proposal fall within the scope of the challenge
 Yes

Can the proposal scale to address future challenges?
 Yes

This project will have a positive impact on Cardano system
f6_assessments.q1:
Has the proposer provided evidence (references, links, etc.) of relevant skills and experience needed to implement the proposal?
Only names have been provided. No Linkedin or FB profiles, No websites. There is also a Github page which cant be reached

Are these links sufficient?
 No
 
Have you the CA visited these links and contacted the relevant people?
 Yes. link is broken to the github page


Have you been able to assess their level of competence?
Not possible to assess 

Does proposer know, in an identifiable manner, the type and number of team members required to implement the proposal?
No 

Has he rationally and logically laid out his team structure and breakdown?
Yes

Has budget been outlined clearly and broken down into identifiable items?
Yes 

IS budget reasonable to achieve the set goals?
Seems somewhat high just for phase 1 

Has the proposer provided a verifiable plan if additional funding is required to implement the proposal?
No plan for additional funds 

Have you verified this plan?
No 


Does proposal offer a realistic timetable to complete the work?
Yes 

Does the proposal provide a sensible and conductible plan for implementation that shows not only what is being done but also how?
Yes

Does the plan describe the resources necessary to implement the proposal?
Yes 
 
Does the proposal clearly explain  technical aspects like architecture, language and technologies if they are crucial for implementation?
Yes 

Has the proposer considered challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation?
No 
 

Based on the answers above , the links have not been provided to the team members, nor any sites given. The budget seems reasonable
f6_assessments.q2:
Is there clearly laid out a roadmap with milestones and a time horizon for achievement.
Yes


Are there clearly defined Metrics/KPIs that define the success of the proposal?
Yes
 

Is there a clear understandable description of the targeted problem?
Yes
 

Is there a clear understandable solution that addresses the problem?
Yes


Has the proposer identified possible hurdles, challenges and difficulties?
No 

How does the proposer plan to deal with these difficulties?
No plan given

Are there contingency plans in place for various outcomes?
No

f6_assessments.q0: This team seeks to include NFTs into the property transactions by encoding Due diligence process into NFTs and as well as property rights and records. Since this project only mentions market introduction in passing, I understand this proposal to be a proof-of-concept. Since an NFT business model is targeted, it is integrated in the corresponding challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has the appropriate knowledge, experience and credentials to successfully implement this proposal. Vincent has been very active in the community in recent weeks (Swarm, After Town Hall) and has also shown that he is capable of dealing with complex issues successfully.  The present business use case is very well explained. What is missing is a critical analysis of the chosen methodology (what are the advantages and disadvantages compared to alternatives). There are also unanswered questions regarding the legal implementation. The budget is well explained and from my perspective it is appropriate in relation to the potential impact.
f6_assessments.q2: The timetable and roadmap are clearly defined. It is also clear what the success of this proposal will look like. The only aspect that could be improved here is to provide some sources of documentation so that the community can actively track the progress of this proposal. Overall, this proposal has good auditability.

solution: ファイナンスのデューデリジェンスを「資金証明」NFTに、不動産の記録や権利を「権利の束」NFTにエンコードする。
experience:
++チーム:++

15年以上のソフトウェア開発経験、Plutusのパイオニア、5年の不動産投資・仲介・エスクローの経験
